name: Saga Asia 2023
description: Saga Farmann startet an epic voyage into an unknown future from Norways oldest town.

name: Saga Med 2024
description: The Saga Farmann adventure continues troughout the Mediteranien with the antique city of Rome as destination.

name: Saga Lundenwic 2025
description: The voyage continues and Saga Farmann leaves the Mediteranien and sets sail for England.
